terms. 
MELANIE 
Mm. 
ARCHIVIST 
What exactly do you need from us anyway? Can’t your showbiz friends help 
you? 
MELANIE 

The Magnus Archives – Episode 063 – The End of the Tunnel 
 
16 
 
No, I’m... most of... most of them won’t talk to me anymore. 
ARCHIVIST 
What happened? Did word get out that you’d given a statement to us? What 
was it, “credulous idiots”? 
MELANIE 
Not exactly... look, in my business your reputation is all that you have. 
ARCHIVIST 
Hm. 
MELANIE 
The industry’s mainly full of sceptics pretending to be believers pretending to 
be sceptics. 
ARCHIVIST 
I think the word you’re looking for is charlatans. 

The Magnus Archives – Episode 063 – The End of the Tunnel 
 
17 
 
MELANIE 
Can you not? Please? I’m to... look, Ghost Hunt UK split up. I mean, not 
formally, but... well, you know, Pete was always a flake to begin with, and the 
others just drifted away. 
ARCHIVIST 
I’m sorry to hear that. I noticed you weren’t updating any more. 
MELANIE 
I tried to get a new crew together, but it was tough. I took to going on 
expeditions solo, but I don’t really have the skills to get useable footage. I saw 
a few weird things. Then I... then I got arrested. 
ARCHIVIST 
Go on. 
MELANIE 
Yes, I, um... I broke into the train graveyard up near Rotherham, got picked up 
by security and I... I wasn’t doing well. When I was being thrown out, some late 
night dogwalker got a video of me screaming at them about ghosts, and when 
it went online... 

The Magnus Archives – Episode 063 – The End of the Tunnel 
 
18 
 
ARCHIVIST 
Your all-important professional reputation went with it. 
MELANIE 
Yes. Look, I have leads that I really need to follow up, but as far as my 
colleagues are concerned, these days I’m the ghost. 
ARCHIVIST 
Well, for what it’s worth, I’m sorry. I do know what it’s like to lack the respect 
of your peers. I’ll have a word with Diana, see if I can get you into the library. 
MELANIE 
Thank you. Seriously. Now how do I get out of this place? 
[Chair scraping] 
ARCHIVIST 
Hm? Oh, Sasha can show you out. 
MELANIE 
Sasha? 

The Magnus Archives – Episode 063 – The End of the Tunnel 
 
19 
 
ARCHIVIST 
Yes, she should be around here somewhere. 
MELANIE 
Oh. Right. Well, let me know about the library, okay? 
[Door opening] 
ARCHIVIST 
Will do. 
[Door closing] 
ARCHIVIST 
What a strange woman. 
End supplemental. 
[Tape clicks off.]
